"Koffie":
"<%me>.
Thank you for all your hard work. This is administrator Koffie."
"In light of your recent activities, we have granted you permission to apply for access to a new type of Photon Art."
"These new Photon Arts are called \"Complex PAs\"."
"Due to the immense strain they place on the body, only ARKS who have reached a certain level are permitted to apply."
"If you have time, please come to the Quest Counter. I will be waiting for you."
